levels.description:
Slightly increase Attack Interval and fire Dragon Arrows that deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage. The arrows explode after a short delay when hitting an enemy, dealing an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@splash_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to the target and nearby enemies
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} arrows and the skill ends when all arrows are used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
